short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Online shopping tool with live comparison matching.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Pose Button is your personal AI shopper. Find the latest fit that matches your style and shape. This extension offers live comparison matching among emerging brands and niche boutiques.

Pose Button connects shoppers from all audiences to affordable, niche alternatives to fashion products that are out of stock, do not fit their body type, and/or originate from untrustworthy retail sources. With Pose Button, shoppers can discover new brands that best represent people like them.  

Dress your best and reduce the stress with Pose Button!

Sign up for a full account and more features on www.posebutton.com!
